statements: SELECT * FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT id, client_id, trend_type FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE client_id = 123 ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT id, trend_type, trend_date FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM MarketTrends GROUP BY client_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_type = 'Technology' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, trend_type FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY client_id ASC;
SELECT id, trend_type, trend_date FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%innovative%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_trends, trend_type FROM MarketTrends GROUP BY trend_type HAVING COUNT(id) > 5;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS total_trends FROM MarketTrends GROUP BY client_id ORDER BY total_trends DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE id = 1;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT opportunity_name FROM ClientOpportunities WHERE opportunity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ClientOpportunities ORDER BY opportunity_name ASC, opportunity_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT id, trend_name FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT opportunity_name, opportunity_description FROM ClientOpportunities WHERE opportunity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends INNER JOIN ClientOpportunities ON MarketTrends.id = ClientOpportunities.id

SELECT trend_name, opportunity_name, opportunity_date FROM MarketTrends LEFT JOIN ClientOpportunities ON MarketTrends.id = ClientOpportunities.id WHERE ClientOpportunities.opportunity_date > '2022-06-01'
SELECT trend_name, opportunity_name, trend_date, opportunity_date FROM MarketTrends, ClientOpportunities WHERE MarketTrends.id = ClientOpportunities.id AND MarketTrends.trend_name LIKE '%tech%'
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT id, trend_name FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, opportunity_description FROM ClientOpportunities WHERE opportunity_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, asset_name, asset_value FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE client_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE client_id = 5 ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT opportunity_description, opportunity_date FROM ClientOpportunities WHERE client_id = 3 AND opportunity_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE client_id = 2 AND asset_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_name LIKE '%technology%' AND trend_description LIKE '%AI%';
SELECT * FROM MarketAnalysis;
SELECT market_name, analysis_result FROM MarketAnalysis;
SELECT analysis_date, market_name FROM MarketAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClientInvestments WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM ClientInvestments WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT market_name, analysis_date FROM MarketAnalysis;
SELECT client_name, investment_amount FROM ClientInvestments WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT opportunity_description, opportunity_type FROM InvestmentOpportunities ORDER BY opportunity_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, investment_amount, investment_date FROM ClientInvestments WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000;
SELECT market_name, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM MarketAnalysis JOIN ClientPortfolio ON MarketAnalysis.market_id = ClientPortfolio.client_id;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT symbol, price, trend FROM MarketTrends WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM Opportunities WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT client_name, email FROM Clients WHERE client_type = 'VIP';
SELECT client_name, symbol, quantity FROM ClientPortfolio ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, trend FROM MarketTrends WHERE volume > 10000;
SELECT client_name, email FROM Clients WHERE client_type = 'VIP' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT symbol, buy_price, buy_date FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY buy_date ASC;
SELECT opportunity_name, category, status FROM Opportunities WHERE opportunity_type = 'Investment' AND status = 'Open';
